descriptionHtml:
[color=1B6AA5][size=6]Endorse![/size][/color]

[color=red]*update:*[/color] you must fire the old one or use this command in game: \'\'set playerfollowercount to 0\'\' Delete the old file to work propperly otherwise there would be 2 ysolldes (:
[color=yellow]Description[/color]
This mods adds a FemaleFollower to the inn: \'\'The Drunken Huntsmen\'\'

[color=yellow]info about character:[/color]

[color=maroon]Weapons:[/color]
-Elven Bow
-Elven Mace

[color=cyan]Magic:[/color]
-Chained Lightning

[color=orange]Future:[/color]
-[color=green]More p[/color]erks.
-More Dialogue.
-Better behavior.

[color=purple]Location:[/color] \'\'The Drunken Huntsmen\'\' in Whiterun.
[color=yellow]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
To get here exactly like in the picture i used:

-DIMONIZED UNP female body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709

-Dark Elven Thalmor-style Equipment
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=712

-High Quality Eyes
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=498

[color=yellow]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=purple]Check out my other mods:[/color]

-WIP, Guards Re-texture
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4953

-Darker/and blooded chainmail iron armor!
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3351 

-Blooded iron amor V2
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3326

-Guy Fawkess mask/V for Vendetta mask (WIP)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1607
[color=purple]Author of THIS fille: RICOOABC, To use her into other mods, give me credit.[/color]
author: Pivotstick
